title: Metro Crime Series: Siapa Lelaki Itu?
overview: The series revolves around the brutal murder of Syerinie. Fatema, a journalist for Harian Metro, is determined to cover a case that has shaken the country. However, her request is not approved by her editor. Instead, the coverage is assigned to her colleague, Rozimi.Fatema is a hot-tempered person. So it is no wonder that she has decided to disobey orders and cooperate with Rozimi.Interviews with witnesses to the incident have led to the discovery of details that have been obscured by the police. According to the witness, he saw a man who may have been Syerinie's killer.Only Fatema and Rozimi report the sighting of this mysterious man. This gives Harian Metro an advantage.The next day, the main suspect is arrested. However, the man is not the man seen by the witnesses to the incident. So, the question that needs to be solved through the 10 episodes of this series is: 'Who is the Man?'
